TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit JournalEntryUnifiedViewConverter extends System.Object implements class System.Windows.Data.IMultiValueConverter
Public NotInheritable Class JournalEntryUnifiedViewConverter Implements IMultiValueConverter

summary.span: 将后退导航历史记录和前进导航历史记录（由 或 公开）合并为单一的 Windows Internet Explorer 7 种样式的导航菜单。

span.span: merges navigation back history and navigation forward history (as exposed by or ) into a single, Windows Internet Explorer 7-style navigation menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这两和显示导航镶边支持使用以下机制的历史记录导航：Both and display navigation chrome that supports history navigation using the following mechanisms: - 一个用于导航的按钮一次备份一段内容。A button for navigating back one piece of content at a time. - 向前导航一段内容的一次的按钮。A button for navigating forward one piece of content at a time. - [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]-样式下拉列表，显示：An [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]-style drop-down list that shows: - 组合的最多 9 个列表项后退导航历史记录和前进导航历史记录中的九个项高达。A combined list of up to nine items in back navigation history and up to nine items in forward navigation history. - 当前段后退和前进导航历史记录方面的内容的位置。The position of the current piece of content with respect to both back and forward navigation history. 导航历史记录存储由已和中的以下属性：The navigation history is stored by both and in the following properties: **后退导航历史记录**: ， 。**Back Navigation History**: , . **前进导航历史记录**: ， 。**Forward Navigation History**: , . 若要创建[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]-样式下拉列表中，并使用合并其各自的后退导航历史记录，并到一个列表的导航历史记录条目前进导航历史记录。To create the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]-style drop-down list, and use to merge their individual back navigation history and forward navigation history into a single list of navigation history entries. 生成的列表包含最多九个条目后退导航历史记录和前进导航历史记录中的九个条目以及当前内容的条目。The resulting list contains up to nine entries from back navigation history and up to nine entries from forward navigation history, plus an entry for the current content. 如果创建自定义导航[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]，并需要提供[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]-样式下拉列表中，可以使用到类似的效果。If you create custom navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)], and need to provide an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]-style drop-down list, you can use to similar effect. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage 此类通常不使用在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。This class is not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何构造基于文本的导航历史记录菜单。The following example shows how to construct a text-based navigation history menu. 使用菜单合并后退和前进导航历史记录的托管导航器。The menu uses to combine both the back and forward navigation histories of the hosted navigator. [!code-xaml[JournalEntryUnifiedPositionConverterSnippets#JournalEntryUnifiedPositionConverterWithMenuXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JournalEntryUnifiedPositionConverterSnippets/CS/mainwindow.xaml#journalentryunifiedpositionconverterwithmenuxaml)]

summary.span: 合并两个导航历史记录堆栈。

returns.span: 如果任何一个传递的导航堆栈都不是 ，则为可用于枚举导航历史记录堆栈合并列表的 。

span.span: An that can be used to enumerate the merged list of navigation history stacks if neither passed navigation stack is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关，导航堆栈中的以下属性有：For , the navigation stacks are available from the following properties: - - 有关，导航堆栈中的以下属性有：For , the navigation stacks are available from the following properties: - 两个传递的导航堆栈被合并为包含多达九个项从每个导航堆栈和当前项的单个导航堆栈中。The two passed navigation stacks are combined into a single navigation stack that contains up to nine items from each navigation stack plus the current item. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage 此类的成员或者通常不使用在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，或不能用于[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。Members of this class are either not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], or cannot be used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定项是后退导航历史记录、前进导航历史记录还是导航器的当前内容。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether an entry is in back navigation history, forward navigation history, or is the current content of a navigator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要获取单个从导航器对象 (， )，调用**才可将 RemoveBackEntry**: ， ， 。To get a single object from a navigator (, ), call **RemoveBackEntry**: , , . 若要获取所有中的对象，枚举返回的条目和。To get all objects from a , enumerate the entries that are returned by and . 若要获取所有中的对象，枚举返回的条目和。To get all objects from a , enumerate the entries that are returned by and . ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage 此类的成员或者通常不使用在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，或不能用于[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。Members of this class are either not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], or cannot be used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
